body:
There is a video by Sky Williams about champ select trolls, ill link it. It basically explains how people troll you if they dont get what they want in champ select, i.e position/champion. Someone in the comment section of this video came up with this wonderful solution that I hope you take into account. 

"Vote to dodge. If 3 people vote the game dodges with no penalties. If you vote to and successfully dodge 3 games in a row you get the 5 minute dodge penalty, for the possibility of people just doing it to be annoying. 3 Just so at least duos cant have control like they can for /ff"

I suspect way too many games would get dodged though. People wouldn't just use it when someone is trolling, they'd start using it if they get to many mid mains or jungle mains or whatever on the same team and it'd end up taking forever to actually get into a game. Wouldn't be worth it imo, its not that often you get trolls, and you hardly lose anything for dodging the occasional game if you have to.

It'd make people way more likely to pick something troll if they dont get what they want as well, since they know their team will almost certainly just dodge
